sen.j: 朝代神社（あさしろじんじゃ）は京都府舞鶴市朝代に鎮座する神社。
sen.e: "Asashiro-jinja Shrine" is a shrine enshrined in Asashiro, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
"Asashiro-jinja Shrine" is a shrine in Asashiro, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
"Asashiro-jinja Shrine" is a shrine in Asashiro, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 伊弉諾尊を主祭神とする。
sen.e: Izanami no mikoto is the main god worshipped.
Izanami no mikoto is the main god worshipped there.
Izanami no mikoto is the main god worshipped there.

sen.j: 旧近代社格制度は府社。
sen.e: Under the old kindai shakaku seido (modern shrine ranking system), it is a prefectural shrine.
Under the old kindai shakaku seido (modern shrine ranking system), it is a prefectural shrine.
Under the old kindai shakaku seido (modern shrine ranking system), it is a prefectural shrine.

sen.j: 縁起
sen.e: Origin and history
Origin and history
Origin and history

sen.j: 672年9月に伊弉諾神宮より勧請して創建されたと伝わる。
sen.e: Legend says it was established by transferring a divided tutelary deity from Izanagi-jingu Shrine in September 672.
Legend says it was established by transferring a divided tutelary deity from Izanagi-jingu Shrine in September 672.
Legend says it was established by transferring a divided tutelary deity from Izanagi-jingu Shrine in September 672.

sen.j: 江戸時代からは田辺藩町民の産土神として奉られてきた。
sen.e: From the Edo period, it has been worshipped as the guardian deity of the birthplace for the townspeople of Tanabe Domain.
From the Edo period, it has been worshipped as the guardian deity of the birthplace for the townspeople of the Tanabe Domain.
From the Edo period, it has been worshipped as the guardian deity of the birthplace for the townspeople of the Tanabe Domain.

sen.j: 江戸時代後期に編纂された「神祇管領吉田家諸国社家執奏記」には田辺朝代社同大河社として丹後国十一社のひとつとされている。
sen.e: In the 'Jingikanrei Yoshidake shokoku shake shisso ki' compiled in the late Edo period, it is described as one of the eleven shrines of Tango Province under the name Tanabeasashiroshadookawasha.
In the 'Jingikanrei Yoshidake shokoku shake shisso ki' compiled in the late Edo period, it is described as one of the eleven shrines of Tango Province under the name Tanabeasashiroshadookawasha.

In the 'Jingikanrei Yoshidake shokoku shake shisso ki' compiled in the late Edo period, it is described as one of the eleven shrines of Tango Province under the name Tanabe asashiro-sha do okawa-sha (田辺朝代社同大河社).
sen.cmt: 区切れを入れ"Tanabe asashiro-sha do okawa-sha"とし、定訳(読み)不明のため原文を加えました。

sen.j: 境内
sen.e: Compound
Compound
Compound

sen.j: 鳥居をくぐって直ぐ左に参道がのび、突き当たりで円隆寺境内と接する。
sen.e: Immediately after the torii (Shinto shrine archway), the road approaching the shrine extends to the left and ends at the compound of Enryu-ji Temple.
Immediately after the torii (Shinto shrine gate), the road approaching the shrine extends to the left and ends at the compound of Enryu-ji Temple.
Immediately after the torii (Shinto shrine gate), the road approaching the shrine extends to the left and ends at the compound of Enryu-ji Temple.

sen.j: 突き当りを右に折れて石段を登ったところに社殿がある。
sen.e: Turn right at the end and go up the stone steps to reach the main building of the shrine.
Turn right at the end and go up the stone steps to reach the main building of the shrine.
Turn right at the end and go up the stone steps to reach the main building of the shrine.

sen.j: 享保17年（1732年）の大火によって旧社殿を焼失したため、現在の社殿（市指定文化財）は元文9年（1739年）の再建である。
sen.e: The old main building burned down in a large fire in 1732, and the current main building (designated cultural property of the city) was reconstructed in 1739.
The old main building burned down in a large fire in 1732, and the current main building (designated cultural property of the city) was reconstructed in 1739.
The old main building burned down in a large fire in 1732, and the current main building (designated cultural property of the city) was reconstructed in 1739.

Location, access

sen.j: 所在地 - 〒624-0842 京都府舞鶴市朝代13
sen.e: Location - 13 Asashiro, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, 624-0842.
Location - 13 Asashiro, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, 624-0842.
Location - 13 Asashiro, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, 624-0842.

sen.j: 交通アクセス - 西日本旅客鉄道舞鶴線・北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線西舞鶴駅から徒歩10分
sen.e: Access - Ten-minute walk from Maizuru Line, West Japan Railway, Kita Kinki Tango Railroad Miyazu Line, Nishimaizuru Station
Access - Ten-minute walk from Maizuru Line, West Japan Railway, Kita Kinki Tango Railroad Miyazu Line, Nishimaizuru Station
Access - Ten-minute walk from Nishimaizuru Station, Maizuru Line of West Japan Railway and Miyazu Line of Kita Kinki Tango Railroad
sen.cmt: 西舞鶴駅が両方の路線にかかるよう文章を一部修正しました。
